description: This file implements an authentication context using React's Context API. It manages user authentication state, including login, logout, and token persistence via localStorage. It uses jwt-decode to parse JWT tokens and provides hooks for consuming authentication data in React components.

classes.name: DecodedToken
classes.description: TypeScript interface extending JwtPayload to include optional email and other properties parsed from JWT tokens.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: React component that provides authentication context, managing token and user state, and providing login and logout functions.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Custom hook that exposes the authentication context to React components.
